name: Infection (NedBoulter)
description:
Don't get too close to zombies, use the torch, have fun :)

Note: I used given assets for walls, and basically all audio (apart from the Minecraft oof :/). I did half bail on them tho.... It's still cool tho :)

Another Note: Look at the source code if ur interested. If you think a bit is fucked, I probably know, it's a big fat fucking mess.
